title: Imputation of Missing Values
description: Many real-world datasets contain missing values, which can cause issues when using machine learning algorithms that assume complete and numerical data. In such cases, it is important to handle missing values appropriately to make the most of the available data. One common strategy is imputation, which involves filling in the missing values based on the known part of the data.

meta.title: Imputation of Missing Values in Machine Learning
meta.description: Explore strategies for imputing missing values in datasets using scikit-learn, a popular Python library for machine learning.
meta.keywords: imputation, machine learning, python, scikit learn, missing values, scikit-learn, scikit-learn playground

i18n.title: 缺失值插补
i18n.description: 许多现实世界的数据集都包含缺失值，当使用假设数据完整且为数值型的机器学习算法时，这些缺失值可能会引发问题。在这种情况下，妥善处理缺失值以充分利用可用数据非常重要。一种常见的策略是插补，即根据数据的已知部分填充缺失值。

meta.title: 机器学习中的缺失值插补
meta.description: 探索使用scikit-learn（一个流行的用于机器学习的Python库）对数据集中的缺失值进行插补的策略。
meta.keywords: 插补, 机器学习, Python, scikit learn, 缺失值, scikit-learn, scikit-learn playground

steps.title: 使用SimpleImputer进行单变量特征插补
使用IterativeImputer进行多变量特征插补
